response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to purchase now, you can secure this remarkable item at a special price of $7,200. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant saving of $800 compared to the market value. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to assist you with your requirements.", "product_price": 7200}
